title: Temporal pattern in train response rates?
description: Here's a quick attempt at exploring why the train set average response rate could be so different to that observed in the Public LB If we make the assumption that there's an underlying temporal pattern to the data, and use the qid values as a proxy for it (higher qid value implies more recent question), then re-sorting the train set by increasing qid and plotting the sliding window of mean response rate should show us some pattern.
